1: וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>laid</n> הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> [אֲחַשֵׁרֹשׁ כ] (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹ֧ושׁ <sup>325 </sup> <n>Ahasuerus</n> ק) מַ֛ס <sup>4522 </sup> <n>a tribute</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the land</n> וְאִיֵּ֥י <sup>339 </sup> <n>and [upon] the isles</n> הַיָּֽם׃ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n>
2: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>And all the acts</n> תָקְפּוֹ֙ <sup>8633 </sup> <n>of his power</n> וּגְב֣וּרָת֔וֹ <sup>1369 </sup> <n>and of his might</n> וּפָרָשַׁת֙ <sup>6575 </sup> <n>and the declaration</n> גְּדֻלַּ֣ת <sup>1420 </sup> <n>of the greatness</n> מָרְדֳּכַ֔י <sup>4782 </sup> <n>of Mordecai</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> גִּדְּל֖וֹ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>advanced</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>whereunto the king</n> הֲלוֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הֵ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> כְּתוּבִ֗ים <sup>3789 </sup> <n>him [are] they not written</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> סֵ֙פֶר֙ <sup>5612 </sup> <n>in the book</n> דִּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>act</n> הַיָּמִ֔ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>age</n> לְמַלְכֵ֖י <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the kings</n> מָדַ֥י <sup>4074 </sup> <n>of Media</n> וּפָרָֽס׃ <sup>6539 </sup> <n>Persia</n>
3: כִּ֣י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> מָרְדֳּכַ֣י <sup>4782 </sup> <n>For Mordecai</n> הַיְּהוּדִ֗י <sup>3064 </sup> <n>the Jew</n> מִשְׁנֶה֙ <sup>4932 </sup> <n>[was] next</n> לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto king</n> אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <sup>325 </sup> <n>Ahasuerus</n> וְגָדוֹל֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and great</n> לַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <sup>3064 </sup> <n>among the Jews</n> וְרָצ֖וּי <sup>7521 </sup> <n>and accepted</n> לְרֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>of the multitude</n> אֶחָ֑יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>of his brethren</n> דֹּרֵ֥שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>seeking</n> טוֹב֙ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>the wealth</n> לְעַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of his people</n> וְדֹבֵ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and speaking</n> שָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of his whole</n> זַרְעֽוֹ׃ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>to all his seed</n>
